column4: Hello all. I have cloned a hard disk with the linux OS. I have made this procedure 20 times before and never had  a problem until now. The cloned copy doesnt boot instead it gives a grub prompt .  I have tried using the live cd to reinstall grub but that isnt helping much..
if you've done it 20 times and this is the first time you've had a problem, maybe you simply messed up on a step somewhere. can you just start over?
